articles.author: Kate Knibbs
articles.title: What Scarlett Johansson v. OpenAI Could Look Like in Court - WIRED
articles.description: If Scarlett Johansson pursues legal action against OpenAI for giving ChatGPT a voice she calls “eerily similar to mine,” she might claim the company breached her right to publicity.
articles.content: It doesnt matter whether a persons actual voice is used in an imitation or not, Rothman says, only whether that audio confuses listeners. In the legal system, there is a big difference between imitat… [+2767 chars]

articles.author: K.J. Yossman
articles.title: Kelly Rowland Appears to Clash With Cannes Red Carpet Usher After Being Rushed Up the Stairs at ‘Marcello Mio’ Premiere - Variety
articles.description: Kelly Rowland was on the Cannes red carpet for the premiere of 'Marcello Mio’ when an usher appeared to forcefully direct her up the stairs.
articles.content:
Kelly Rowland appeared to admonish an usher on the Cannes red carpet on Tuesday evening after being rushed up the stairs by staff at the festival.
Rowland was at the premiere of “Marcello Mio,” whic… [+2325 chars]
